#api_response#

{
"class InstructionManager": "This class defines and manages instructions for proper communication with the ChatGPT model.",
"def __init__(self,notation=True,suggestions=True,abort=True,generate_title=True,additional_responses=True,additional_instruction=False,test_it=False)": "Initialization function for the InstructionManager class. It introduces several parameters which guide the interaction process such as notation, suggestions, abort, generate title, additional responses, additional instruction and a testing parameter.",
"def get_additional_responses(self)": "This method interprets the 'additional_responses' value, determining its boolean or string content to generate appropriate responses in the conversation.",
"def get_generate_title(self)": "This method interprets the 'generate_title' value, determining its boolean or string content to generate appropriate responses in the conversation.",
"def get_notation(self)": "This method interprets the 'notation' value, determining its boolean or string content to generate appropriate responses in the conversation.",
"def get_suggestions(self)": "This method interprets the 'suggestions' value, determining its boolean or string content to generate appropriate responses in the conversation.",
"def get_abort(self)": "This method interprets the 'abort' value, determining its boolean or string content to generate appropriate responses in the conversation.",
"def initialize_instructions(self)": "This method initializes the instruction dictionary based on the various parameters provided during object initialization.",
"def get_instructions(self,instructions_js=None)": "This method generates the instruction text based on the attributes of the instruction dictionary. It may also accept an externally defined instruction dictionary."
}
